items.title: Trump administration sends letter wiping out addiction, mental health grants
items.description: The Trump administration sent hundreds of letters Tuesday terminating federal grants supporting mental health and drug addiction services.

items.title: The risks of AI in schools outweigh the benefits, report says
items.description: A new report warns that AI poses a serious threat to children's cognitive development and emotional well-being.
